UpdateSourceArgs: -c "DotnetVersion=\"{{DotnetVersion}}\"; cd \"{{$FullRootDir}}\" && if [[ -x dotnet/dotnet ]]; then InstalledVersion=$(dotnet/dotnet --list-runtimes | sed -n \"s/^Microsoft\.AspNetCore\.App \\([0-9.]*\\) .*/\\1/p\" | head -n1); else InstalledVersion=\"\"; fi; if [[ -z \"$DotnetVersion\" ]]; then DotnetVersion=$(wget -qO- https://builds.dotnet.microsoft.com/dotnet/release-metadata/9.0/releases.json | jq -r \".[\\\"latest-runtime\\\"]\"); fi; if [[ ! \"$DotnetVersion\" =~ ^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$ ]]; then echo \"Invalid ASP.NET Core Runtime version format specified\" && exit 1; elif [[ \"$InstalledVersion\" == \"$DotnetVersion\" ]]; then echo \"ASP.NET Core Runtime v$DotnetVersion already installed. Skipping\" && exit 0; else [[ -f dotnet.tar.gz ]] && rm -f dotnet.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1; wget -qO dotnet.tar.gz https://builds.dotnet.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/Runtime/$DotnetVersion/aspnetcore-runtime-$DotnetVersion-linux-x64.tar.gz || { echo \"Download failed from the Microsoft CDN. This is a fault with the CDN, not AMP. Aborting\"; exit 1; }; rm -rf dotnet/* >/dev/null 2>&1 && tar -xzf dotnet.tar.gz -C dotnet >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f dotnet.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo \"ASP.NET Core Runtime v$DotnetVersion downloaded\"; fi"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; $DotnetVersion='{{DotnetVersion}}'; Set-Location -Path '{{$FullRootDir}}'; if (Test-Path 'dotnet/dotnet.exe') { $InstalledVersion = (& dotnet/dotnet.exe --list-runtimes | Where-Object { $_ -like 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App*' } | Select-Object -First 1).Split()[1] } else { $InstalledVersion = '' }; if ( [string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($DotnetVersion) ) { $DotnetVersion=(Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri https://builds.dotnet.microsoft.com/dotnet/release-metadata/9.0/releases.json).\"latest-runtime\" }; if ($DotnetVersion -notmatch '^\d+\.\d+\.\d+$') { Write-Output \"Invalid ASP.NET Core Runtime version format specified\"; exit 1 } elseif ( $InstalledVersion -eq $DotnetVersion ) { Write-Output \"ASP.NET Core Runtime v$DotnetVersion already installed. Skipping\"; exit 0 } else { if ( Test-Path dotnet.zip ) { Remove-Item dotnet.zip -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue *> $null }; try { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri https://builds.dotnet.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/Runtime/$DotnetVersion/aspnetcore-runtime-$DotnetVersion-win-x64.zip -OutFile dotnet.zip -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Output \"Download failed from the Microsoft CDN. This is a fault with the CDN, not AMP. Aborting\"; exit 1; }; Remove-Item -Path 'dotnet/*' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Expand-Archive -Path \"dotnet.zip\" -DestinationPath \"dotnet\" -Force *> $null; if ( Test-Path dotnet.zip ) { Remove-Item dotnet.zip -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue *> $null }; Write-Output \"ASP.NET Core Runtime v$DotnetVersion downloaded\" }"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path '{{$FullBaseDir}}server'; $rel = (Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://api.github.com/repos/sp-tarkov/build/releases/latest'); $DownloadURL = ($rel.assets | Where-Object { $_.name -like '*.7z' } | Select-Object -First 1).browser_download_url; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($DownloadURL)) { $DownloadURL = [regex]::Match($rel.body, 'https:\\S+?\\.7z').Value }; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($DownloadURL)) { Write-Output 'Failed to locate an SPT .7z download URL in the latest release metadata.'; exit 1 }; Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri \"$DownloadURL\" -OutFile 'SPT.7z'; & \"{{$FullBaseDir}}7-Zip/7z.exe\" x -y -aoa SPT.7z | Out-Null; Remove-Item -Path 'SPT.7z' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null"

-c "cd \"{{$FullBaseDir}}server\" && release=$(wget -qO- https://api.github.com/repos/sp-tarkov/build/releases/latest) && DownloadURL=$(echo \"$release\" | jq -r '.assets[]? | select(.name|endswith(\".7z\")) | .browser_download_url' | head -n1) && ([[ -n \"$DownloadURL\" && \"$DownloadURL\" != \"null\" ]] || DownloadURL=$(echo \"$release\" | jq -r \".body\" | grep -Eo \"https://[^ ]+\\.7z\" | head -n1)) && [[ -n \"$DownloadURL\" ]] || { echo 'Failed to locate an SPT .7z download URL in the latest release metadata.'; exit 1; } && wget -qO SPT.7z \"$DownloadURL\" && \"{{$FullBaseDir}}7-Zip/7zzs\" x -y -aoa SPT.7z >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f SPT.7z >/dev/null 2>&1 && chmod +x SPT/SPT.Server.Linux >/dev/null 2>&1"

-NoProfile -Command "Set-Location -Path '{{$FullBaseDir}}server'; if (Test-Path 'SPT.bak') { Remove-Item 'SPT.bak' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null }; if (Test-Path 'SPT') { Copy-Item -Path 'SPT' -Destination 'SPT.bak' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null }"
-c "cd \"{{$FullBaseDir}}server\"; [[ -d SPT.bak ]] && rm -rf SPT.bak >/dev/null 2>&1; [[ -d SPT ]] && \cp -rf SPT SPT.bak >/dev/null 2>&1 || exit 0"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path '{{$FullBaseDir}}server'; $DownloadURL = [regex]::Match((Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://api.github.com/repos/sp-tarkov/build/releases/latest').body, 'https://\\S+?\\.7z').Value; Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri \"$DownloadURL\" -OutFile 'SPT.7z'; & \"{{$FullBaseDir}}7-Zip/7z.exe\" x -y -aoa SPT.7z | Out-Null; Remove-Item -Path 'SPT.7z' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null"

-c "cd \"{{$FullBaseDir}}server\" && DownloadURL=$(wget -qO- https://api.github.com/repos/sp-tarkov/build/releases/latest | jq -r \".body\" | grep -Eo \"https://[^ ]+\\.7z\") && wget -qO SPT.7z $DownloadURL && \"{{$FullBaseDir}}7-Zip/7zzs\" x -y -aoa SPT.7z >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f SPT.7z >/dev/null 2>&1 && chmod +x SPT/SPT.Server.Linux >/dev/null 2>&1"

-NoProfile -Command "$cfgPath = 'tarkov/headless/config.json'; if (!(Test-Path $cfgPath)) { $cfg = [ordered]@{ serverUrl = '{{server_url}}'; profileId = '{{profile_id}}'; raidPort = {{RaidPort}}; restartAfterRaids = {{restart_after_raids}} }; $json = $cfg | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path (Split-Path $cfgPath) -Force | Out-Null; Set-Content -Path $cfgPath -Value $json -Encoding UTF8 }"
